attributes.action: Up the amount of the state pension to a value that reflects the worth of the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When someone has worked their whole life in one form or another for the benifit of others,they should have the financial dignity to live with ease after retirement

rejection.details: This appears to have been submitted twice.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
